title: AlarmStateTransition (Enum)
text:
TYPE AlarmStateTransition :
This enumeration defines the possible state changes an alarm can have.

rows.Name: NoTransition
rows.Comment: Value signals, that there is no alarm state transition

rows.Name: Pending
rows.Comment:
An inactive alarm is going to be pending (alarm condition is true, but alarm is
not yet active).

rows.Name: Activate
rows.Comment:
An inactive (resp. pending) alarm is going to be active
(alarm condition is true).

rows.Name: Deactivate
rows.Comment:
An active alarm is going to be inactive (alarm condition is
no longer true).

rows.Name: Acknowledge
rows.Comment: Alarm is still active and will be acknowledged.

rows.Name: Confirm
rows.Comment: Alarm is no longer active and will be confirmed.
